title: Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji: Mirai-hen
synopsis: Twenty-five years ago, the world was annihilated. With the coming of the Overfiend, God of all Gods, the human, demon, and beast realms collapsed together in chaos. With the promise that he would be born in 100 years to re-create his failed world, the Overfiend settled back to sleep within his mother's womb.
related_anime: ['Shin Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji Mataiden', 'Urotsukidouji', 'Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji: Inferno Road']
voices: ['Nishimura, Tomohiro', 'Ootomo, Ryuuzaburou', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Takada, Yumi', 'Takada, Yumi', 'Yamaguchi, Ken']
